Package com.iv1201.project.recruitment.application

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.iv1201.project.recruitment.application.UserService
@Component
@Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
A service class for handling database calls concerning <>User entities.

  • Method Details

    • addNewUser

      @Transactional public User addNewUser​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String clearTextPassword, UserService.Role role, java.lang.String ssn) throws UserServiceError
      Adds a new user to the system if valid
      Parameters:
      email - a unique valid email
      firstName - users first name
      lastName - users last name
      clearTextPassword - users password as cleartext
      role - the role of the user
      ssn - users social security number as String
      Throws:
      UserServiceError - if user is not valid, or conflicting with an existing user.
      See Also:
      UserService.Role

    • saveUser

      @Transactional public User saveUser​(User user)
      Saves the user to the store If the user has new competences, they will be stored as well and the retrurned user will contain the saved competences, including generated ID's If the user already exists, it will be updated in the store
      Parameters:
      user - the user to save
      Returns:
      the saved user.

    • saveAvailabilityToUser

      @Transactional public void saveAvailabilityToUser​(User user, java.time.LocalDate from, java.time.LocalDate to) throws UserServiceError
      Saves an availability to a user if the user already does not already have an availability with the same dates.
      Parameters:
      user - to thom the availability is saved
      from - availability start date
      to - availability end date
      Throws:
      UserServiceError

    • saveCompetenceToUser

      public void saveCompetenceToUser​(User user, Competence competence, java.lang.Double years)
      Saves a competence to a user.
      Parameters:
      user - to whom the competence is saved
      competence - to save
      years - of experience

    • saveLocaleToUser

      public void saveLocaleToUser​(User user, java.util.Locale locale)
      Saves a locale to a user.
      Parameters:
      user - to whom the locale is saved
      locale - to save

    • restoreUnmigratedPerson

      @Transactional public void restoreUnmigratedPerson​(java.lang.String email) throws UserServiceError
      Restores an incomplete user, identified by an email address. Calling this method will, if possible move the user and its associated availabilities and competence profiles to the appropriate tables. This method does not throw if no user is found, since this would leak data about what users are in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the incomplete user
      Throws:
      UserServiceError - the first validational error that was encoutnered

    • findByEmail

      @Transactional public java.util.Optional<User> findByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Gets a user from the data store. This method is transactional because of the greedy lookup on linked attributes.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user to get.
      Returns:
      the found user or empty

    • existsByEmail

      public boolean existsByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Returns true if a matching row exists, else false
      Parameters:
      email - the email to check by.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists else false

    • validateUser

      public boolean validateUser​(User user, java.lang.String cleartextPass) throws UserServiceError
      Throws:
      UserServiceError
